string-array.name: city_facts_array
string-array.item: New York City comprises 5 boroughs sitting where the Hudson River meets the Atlantic Ocean.
Los Angeles is known for its Mediterranean climate, ethnic diversity, Hollywood entertainment industry, and sprawling metropolis.
Chicago is known for its impressive architecture, particularly the Willis Tower (formerly the Sears Tower).
Houston is the largest city in Texas and is known for its space research and the NASA Space Center.
Phoenix is known for its year-round sun and warm temperatures, and it anchors a sprawling, multicity metropolitan area known as the Valley of the Sun.
